explanation: [0-0] On a road, there is a black tire standing upright. Above the tire are the legs and buttocks of a person wearing black pants. The legs are straight, and the buttocks are sticking out.

[0-10] Then the camera moves to the right, and you can see that it is a motorcycle. The person uses their right foot to step on the kick start lever several times to start the engine, then retracts their foot. Immediately afterwards, the camera continues to move to the right, revealing a person with a tattooed arm. The person with the tattoo reaches their hand towards the motorcycle's engine and fiddles with it a few times. Then, the tattooed man gets up, holds the handlebar with his right hand, walks to the front of the motorcycle, stands with his legs on either side of the front wheel, bends down, and reaches out with his right hand to twist something near the engine.
